lines.text: I wanted to be near to my mother.
Have you lived in Blackpool all your life?
It's all getting very French. And I don't like it.
Why do all the best things in life belong to the past?
I never saw anything funny that didn't cause pain.
Tell me, of this list, which do you think is the odd one out? House... school... dog... cinema... church.
'Cause a dog wouldn't go to the cinema, would it?

[stares at Jack for a bit, then composes himself]
Which of *these* is the odd one out... Malice... jealousy... greed... envy... and... *kindness*.
